summary: Description test for my upcoming mod. Should be set to private anyhow. Will delete after I'm done.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=cENTURY gOTHIC][size=6][b][color=#b6d7a8]Part of the[/color][color=#ffa500] [/color][color=#f1c232]Unique Voiced Follower Enid Project[/color][/b][/size][/font]
[size=4]Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70990/?]HERE[/url] to learn more[/size][/center]





[left] [font=cENTURY gOTHIC][color=#93c47d][size=6][b]About[/b][/size][/color][/font]
This is a light armor with a glass armor rating. This can’tbe crafted or found in a chest.
In game, press the ~ key to open up the console. Type in [color=#b6d7a8]help brigida[/color]. Or [color=#b6d7a8]help __ [/color]if you’re lazy like me.
You’ll find the numbers of her items. Type in [color=#b6d7a8]player.additem[/color][color=#6d9eeb] INSERTNUMBERHERE[/color] [color=#b6d7a8]1[/color] and the armor is added into the inventory.


 
It’s recommended that you put on some gloves because there is a small hand gap. I also thought I squashed this bug, but the dress will not shade properly when in the shade. I’m investigating both at the moment.



You have my permission to rerelease this as a translation,body conversion, or retexture.[/left]
[color=#93c47d][font=cENTURY gOTHIC][b][size=6]CREDITS[/size][/b][/font]

[/color]Thank you CDProjektRed for making the Witcher 2. Best armor designs ever.

Thank you Urshi, SydneyB, Nimezis and ZZjay for being holy saints of patiencefor my many Blender questions.
author: sumojellybean
